m_szDocTitle: Hybrids only a "bridging technology" before EVs, says Audi CEO
m_szDocSumamry: Hybrids only a "bridging technology" before EVs, says Audi CEO by Jim Holder, Autocar UK   Mar 03, 2016 Hybrid and plug-in hybrid technology will only be a “bridging technology” for around 10 years, according to Audi CEO Rupert Stadler, until full electric driving becomes more mainstream. “Hybrid and plug-in hybrids are a transitional and bridge technology for about the next ten years,” said Stadler, who said he expected electrified cars, including hybrids, to account for 20-25% of all sales by 2025.
